Package com.technology.jep.jepria.client.widget.field.multistate.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AfterExpandEvent.AfterExpandHandler
    Handler class for AfterExpandEvent events.
    AfterExpandEvent.HasAfterExpandHandlers
    A widget that implements this interface is a public source of AfterExpandEvent events.
    BeforeExpandEvent.BeforeExpandHandler
    Handler class for BeforeExpandEvent events.
    BeforeExpandEvent.HasBeforeExpandHandlers
    A widget that implements this interface is a public source of BeforeExpandEvent events.
    BeforeSelectEvent.BeforeSelectHandler<T>
    Handler class for BeforeSelectEvent events.
    BeforeSelectEvent.HasBeforeSelectHandlers<T>
    A widget that implements this interface is a public source of BeforeSelectEvent events.
    CancellableEvent
    Interface for events that can be cancelled.
    CheckChangeEvent.CheckChangeHandler<V extends JepOption>
    Handler class for CheckChangeEvent events.
    CheckChangeEvent.HasCheckChangeHandlers<V extends JepOption>
    A widget that implements this interface is a public source of CheckChangeEvent events.
    InputForbiddenEvent.HasInputForbiddenHandlers
    Реализующий данный интерфейс виджет - источник событий InputForbiddenEvent.
    InputForbiddenEvent.InputForbiddenHandler
    Обработчик для событий InputForbiddenEvent.
    PasteForbiddenEvent.HasPasteForbiddenHandlers
    Реализующий данный интерфейс виджет - источник событий PasteForbiddenEvent.
    PasteForbiddenEvent.PasteForbiddenHandler
    Обработчик для событий PasteForbiddenEvent.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AfterExpandEvent  
    BeforeExpandEvent
    Event type for widgets that can be expanded.
    BeforeSelectEvent<T>
    Event type for widgets that can be selected.
    CancellableEventImpl<H extends com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler>
    Cancellable Event Type If you need to stop the event propagation you should this event type.
    CheckChangeEvent<V extends JepOption>
    Handler class for CheckChangeEvent events.
    InputForbiddenEvent
    Событие, генерируемое виджетом MaskedTextBox в ситуации, когда пользователь пытается ввести недопустимый символ.
    PasteForbiddenEvent
    Событие, генерируемое виджетом MaskedTextBox в ситуации, когда пользователь пытается вставить недопустимое значение.
